Description: Object made of fired Nile clay, probably used as a spacer or a weight. The clay has inclusions of mica and few voids of organic temper. The object is shaped rectangular and flat with a rectangular section with rounded edges. Along the flat side three perforations, one at each end and one in the middle, all three pierced from the same side. The holes have a diameter of 0.35-0.5 cm.
